adjust

public void adjust(Graphics2D graphic)
Description copied from interface: Adjustable
Recalculates the dimension and position of the implementor. Compound adjustables which contains other adjustables may need to invoke this method recursively.

Parameters:
graphic - Graphic context used for font measuring.
